law.catch_line: // EFFECTIVE UNTIL JUNE 30, 2015 PER CHAPTERS 624 AND 625 OF 2008 //...
law.text:
// EFFECTIVE UNTIL JUNE 30, 2015 PER CHAPTERS 624 AND 625 OF 2008 //
There is a Maryland Community Health Resources Commission.
The Commission is an independent commission that operates within the Department.
The purpose of the Commission is to increase access to health care through community health resources.
